channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD’s stock builds on its historic rally as the AI trade heats up again
item.description: AMD’s stock is enjoying its best three-day run since 2016, and one analyst sees a nice path ahead.

item.title: Meme-stock ETF is back from the dead. Last time, its launch coincided with the 2021 market top.
item.description: The ETF’s biggest holding is Opendoor, a name that has sparked comparisons with the meme-stock explosion of 2021

item.title: Costco sales run higher after yet another monthly sales gain, helped by digital demand

item.title: History says bitcoin could peak soon, but here’s the case for it to keep climbing
item.description: Bitcoin may hit a peak soon if its four-year cycle still holds true. But one analyst argues that the boom-and-bust cycle may no longer apply,

item.title: The government shutdown won’t stop the IRS from fining people who miss this key October tax deadline
item.description: The shutdown might delay the 2026 filing season’s start, one expert notes.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
